page.title: 04SOCIAL LIFE IN FLAX BOURTON
page.content: There are very few events in Flax Bourton. Without the Church or School there would be almost none.The School events that happen every year are the Christmas Party,the school fete,pet show,school sports,small school sports and bonfire night.The annual Church events are the Church fete,Christmas Eve party and the Jumble Sale.Some events are not annual like the School teddy bears picnic,the Christmas bazaar.There are quite a few cheese and wine party or barbecue for all the village.Barrow Gurney Church joins in all theese events but only Mother Union actually meet at the Church.Flax Bourton has not many events through its year.
